--Scryed--

"I, I see..." She says taking this in. "Megatron must be stopped. I 
want to join you and these Maximals here and now. Ending Megatron's 
reign is more important than rejoining my old team." Scryed nods to 
Hot Rod confirming her desires. "Who's the leader of the Maximals? 
I'd like to request to join formally."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "Well, it's nice to meet you Scryed. After they waged a short war 
here with Megatron's crew, they won, an dgot back to Cybertron. 
Although there was quite a few twists during it all. But now 
Megatron has escaped, got a new crew and came back. That's why we 
are here."
